thread.title: Emmerdale spoiler: Ashley Thomas continues to deteriorate and his son Arthur Thomas blames himself

author: Hayley Minn
title: Emmerdale spoiler: Ashley Thomas continues to deteriorate and his son Arthur Thomas blames himself
text:
Get soaps updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Ashley Thomas continues to deteriorate in tonight's Emmerdale . 
And his dementia continues to leave the Thomas family in turmoil, after it was revealed he had pneumonia in last night's episode of the ITV soap. 
But will his young son Arthur Thomas be left fearing that it's his fault? 
Ashley took a turn for the worse in last night's Emmerdale, as he had a violent coughing fit and found blood on his hands. Read More The Thomas family are in turmoil over Ashley Laurel was told he has pneumonia 
Laurel was devastated to find out that Ashley has pneumonia and sought comfort from Doug. 
Shattered by the news, Laurel resolves to bring her husband home so he can die surrounded by his friends, family and loved ones. 
Meanwhile, in tonight's episode, Liv Flaherty receives some bad news. Read More Arthur blames himself Is this it? (Photo: ITV) 
Could it be something to do with her brother Aaron Dingle as he gets released from prison? 
Elsewhere, Tracy Metcalfe suffers a setback. 
*Emmerdale continues on ITV1 tonight at 7pm Like us on Facebook
